OpticalImagePatchesOneCellTrials

public static void OpticalImagePatchesOneCellTrials(edu.stanford.math.nebtda.Density density,
                                                    edu.stanford.math.nebtda.TrialHelper t)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
Runs the 1-cell trials for the OpticalImagePatches data set. The primary circle 1-cells are easy to find, and are found in the same fashion as 1-cells in the other data sets. The secondary circle 1-cells are harder to find. To do so, we consider numAntipodalTrials initial bands between DCT basis vectors e1 and -e1 (resp. e2 and -e2). We sort these initial bands (roughly) based on which ones are most likely to flow to the secondary circles. We only run the first numAntipodalTrialsRun initial bands, generally finding the secondary circles. Of course, one could run all numAntipodalTrials bands, but this requires a lot of simulation time.

Parameters:
density - density estimator
t - trial helper
Throws:
java.io.IOException
